meanings.sent1: She ran opposeless towards the finish line, winning the race effortlessly.

meanings.definition: Unable to be opposed or resisted.
meanings.sent1: The superhero's powers were so opposeless that no villain could defeat him.
meanings.sent2: The castle stood opposeless on top of the hill, its walls impenetrable.
meanings.sent3: The cake was so deliciously opposeless that no one could resist having a second slice.
meanings.sent4: Her beauty was opposeless, captivating everyone who laid eyes on her.
meanings.sent5: The mountain stood opposeless against the storm, its peak untouched by the raging winds.
